snippet.title: ROJO: A Spanish Horror Experience | Trailer
snippet.description:
Play for free on Itch.io: 
https://mmorenos95.itch.io/rojo-a-spanish-horror-experience

Explore the apartment of a nostalgic Francoist to find your friend in this short First Person Horror experience set in Spain.

Your friend has been missing for days. The only clue she has left you is a note with an address: "Calle de Salamanca, Madrid. Bloque 13, 3°A".

This game has been developed for no commercial purposes. Although some of the elements that appear are based on real life, this game is pure fiction. ROJO does not represent an apology to the Franco regime or its figure. On the contrary, it is a representation of the terror produced by fascist ideologies, fanaticism and extremism.

A game developed by Miguel Moreno with Unreal Engine.
